CustomField.description: This should only be checked when you have a signed agreement that does not have delivery schedule or dates. Formally referred to as a Financial Order - requested by Linda Sherman
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This should only be checked when you have a signed agreement that does not have delivery schedule or dates. Formally referred to as a Financial Order. Forecast category must be Commit. The Signed Agreement should be attached to all opportunities, quotes
CustomField.label: Contractual Commit
